title: Enter the unique probate code HMRC sent you
hint: The unique probate code looks like this: CTS 0405231104 3tpp s8e9 and is on the first page of the letter.

uniqueProbateCodeId.required: The unique probate code has been entered incorrectly. The unique probate code has 21 characters and is in this format CTS 0405231104 3tpp s8e9
uniqueProbateCodeId.invalid: The unique probate code has been entered incorrectly. The unique probate code has 21 characters and is in this format CTS 0405231104 3tpp s8e9
